column4: Hum, where do I configure ubuntu to start amarok instead of rythmbox when I insert my ipod nano?
system/pref/preferred apps
Ive tried setting custom in multimedia tab and execute command  amarok without any success
are you sure you're putting the right command in there?
pretty sure I type amarok , yes.
what exact file are ar eyou trying to assign to amarok?
I plugin my usb-thingie to my ipod and rythmbox is starting instead of amarok :/
ah.. ok.. i'm not sure if you can get an Ipod to autostart Amarok or not.. never tried myself.
I just got myself an iPod - I guess ill figure it out somehow tho
what kind of ipod?
iPod nano v3
cool.. good luck getting it workin.. :)
i thought you said you tried that?
I didn't try nautilus preferences, only system->pref->prefered applications..
jsut right click and choose unmount... wait a second, and disconnect
there's a bit of a work around.. what version of pidgin are you using?
try this.. close pidgin, open a terminal... "sudo apt-get install msn-pecan".. restart Pidgin, create new Account, then in the drop down protocol, choose "wlm", and plug in your MSN account info
that works like a charm.
it seems to work for most.
i've not got that one, not sure.
try to update !brokemsn trigger with that specified information. Thanks for the help
i'll suggest it to Jack_Sparrow
